comment.title: Nice Place
comment.comment: My boyfriend and I enjoyed our stay at this very classy hotel. The rooms although small were very nicely decorated, and we managed very well. The bathroom was clean and decently sized. The staff was extremely helpful and friendly. I will surely recommend this hotel to all of my friends. Overall a wonderful experience!

comment.title: Great for families
comment.comment: A wonderful experience! The artwork was phenomenal, and our rooms were very nice and roomy. The customer service was also above expectations. We ate and entertained in impressive adult beverages. You will not be disappointed! We will be staying here again in the future and recommend them to all of our friends.

comment.title: Very Good
comment.comment: The staff was very approachable and helpful. The breakfast was good. I am a semi-regular guest at this hotel and each time they seem to surpass the previous experience, from check-in to room atmosphere and level of cleanliness to the gorgeous meal and wines. The pool was so relaxing and calm. Everything just went out perfectly.

comment.title: Good
comment.comment: Good service! Their staff that was working out there were very accommodating, nice, and careful. Besides, all the amenities in their hotel were wonderful, clean, and comfortable. Honestly, I truly enjoyed my couple of day's staycation in there. The price was reasonable and all worth it. I promise to come back!
